properties.areaDesc: S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 31 at 3:40AM EST until February 1 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
4 to 7 ft expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Cape Hatteras.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 11 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM EST SATURDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
